title: coinriches
author: coinriches
created_time: May 13, 2022, 11:19:42 PMLast edit: May 13, 2022, 11:31:56 PM by coinriches
content: Decentralization, with its no-single-point-of-failure appeal, is among the most important features of the blockchain tech. Then came the DAO and its unique governance model to take decentralization to a whole new level. But which DAO project will be the standout upcoming DAO project in the Cryptosphere this year? I read EXPERTY.IO's sampled opinions of it's numerous experts. which can be found here on their siteDo you know of anymore such projects?
